Here is a translation of the characters on the
tsuba that was given me by Sumie Kashima of
Usagiya Sword in Japan. It seems it is a poem
or haiku about winter, although an exact rendering
wasn't possible.

Anyone familiar with a poem or haiku that would
fit this?

http://home.earthlink.net/~ttstein/kanji3.jpg

Thanks
Rich S
